docs.lead_paragraph: IT was a little over a year ago that the editors of Story and Edward J. O'Brien began to crusade on behalf of the novella. By this new term, derived from the Italian, they hoped to clear up a long-existing confusion, and to give a neglected form of fiction its rightful name and status. Lest the issue still
